content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I executed the Python file "average.py" again using the "execute_python_file" command, and it returned the message "The average of the numbers is: 3.0". Additionally, I attempted to use the "get_hyperlinks" command, but it failed due to returning too much output. I then successfully used the "write_to_file" command to create a new file named "new_file.txt" with the text "This is a new line of text that I am writing to the file." I then used the "delete_file" command to delete the "new_file.txt" file. I also used the "read_file" command to read the contents of the "productive_things_to_do.txt" file, which included a list of over 100 productive things to do when bored, emphasizing the importance of rest and relaxation, and encouraging readers to try new things and improve themselves. I used the "list_files" command to list all the files in the current directory. Finally, I used the "append_to_file" command to add the text "- Practice mindfulness and meditation." to the "productive_things_to_do.txt" file.
"""
